title: fix: OpenClaw branding â€” favicon, logos, fonts
author: ElliotEtag

gist.summary: Updated OpenClaw branding with proper logos, corrected font weights, and a responsive mobile header.
gist.impact: Users get a cleaner, more consistent visual experience that looks great on all devices.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the Pollinations bee artist adding finishing touches to a pixelated 'OpenClaw' signboard. Cozy 8-bit pixel art aesthetic. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. The bee holds a tiny pixel brush with chunky retro sprites. Warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley or A Short Hike. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
